name: The Digital Gateway
description:
A 110ft long interactive corridor made for the 2010 Olympics game at the Commerce Centre

Goals

Create the system that will display the experience. Develop and animate all the secondary animations (lines, background animations) that is draw when a user walk thru the corridor.

Tools

  • Flash for the animations and the app
  • Infrared sensors to detect people position along the corridor

Made at

Switch United
